          Use the parent Resource class instead.

Deprecated Methods
org.restlet.resource.ClientResource.createRequest(Request)
          Use ClientResource.createRequest() instead 
org.restlet.util.Series.createSeries(List)
          Use Series.Series(Class, List) constructor instead. 
org.restlet.security.SecretVerifier.createUser(String)
            
org.restlet.Client.getConnectTimeout()
          Use the equivalent "socketConnectTimeoutMs" connector parameter. 
org.restlet.service.LogService.getLogFormat()
          Use the LogService.getResponseLogFormat() method instead. 
org.restlet.data.Status.getName()
          Use Status.getReasonPhrase() instead. 
org.restlet.data.ClientInfo.getPreferredVariant(List)
          Use ConnegService instead. 
org.restlet.data.ClientInfo.getPreferredVariant(List, MetadataService)
          Use the ClientInfo.getPreferredVariant(List) method instead. 
org.restlet.resource.ClientResource.handle(Request)
          Use the ClientResource.handleOutbound(Request) method instead 
org.restlet.resource.Directory.setAlphaComparator()
          Call Directory.useAlphaComparator() instead 
org.restlet.resource.Directory.setAlphaNumComparator()
          Call Directory.useAlphaComparator() instead 
org.restlet.Application.setClientRoot(Class)
          Use Application.setOutboundRoot(Class) instead 
org.restlet.Client.setConnectTimeout(int)
          Use the equivalent connector parameters. 
org.restlet.service.TunnelService.setHeaderTunnel(boolean)
          Use TunnelService.setHeadersTunnel(boolean) method instead. 
org.restlet.service.LogService.setLogFormat(String)
          Use LogService.setResponseLogFormat(String) instead. 
org.restlet.util.ServerList.setNext(Class)
          To be removed.
